attributes.action: Harsher sentences for sex offenders against children.
attributes.additional_details: Due to the current minimum terms are not good enough. People who abuse children are getting suspended sentences and its disgraceful! They is no justice for victims after they have their life destroyed and the sex offenders get to walk away free.
attributes.background: We want harsher punishments for sex offenders against children to ensure justice for victims and community safety. Implement stricter minimum custodial sentences, end early release and enforce stronger monitoring after release.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Introduce mandatory life sentences for child sex offences
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/715556

Toughen up the law to ensure stricter punishment for child sexual abuse material
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700084
